events.message: The claimant reported a rear-end collision involving their car on April 30, 2024, requesting coverage for damages.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after review of initial claim details and vehicle involved.
An agent specializing in vehicle collision claims was assigned to handle this case and contact the claimant.
The claimant was contacted to confirm receipt of the claim and acknowledge the start of processing.
Additional documents including police report and repair estimates were requested from the vehicle owner.
The claimant submitted all required documents promptly including police report and mechanic's damage assessment.
Claims adjuster began investigating the claim by verifying details and scheduling vehicle inspection.
The investigation verified the claim details and confirmed liability for the accident was with the other driver.
A settlement amount covering the full cost of repairs was proposed to the claimant for their approval.
The claimant provided positive feedback on the quick response and clear communication during the claim process.
The claim was officially approved and the payment process was initiated following claimantâ€™s acceptance.
The settlement payment was issued for the repairs and expenses related to the auto accident claim.
The claim was closed successfully after confirming payment receipt and claimant satisfaction.
All case files and documents related to the auto accident are archived for record-keeping and compliance.
